Posts.EditableText: Is there a way for me to edit quest games that i downloaded?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way for me to edit quest games that i downloaded?

Posts.EditableText:
Yes. The problem is that Quest loads up all the code needed to run the script, and remove the interface code so that you can view the code in the UI.
The result is that there is a lot of code added that makes it hard to determine what the programmer wrote.
Posts.HTML:
